alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Fayette; Indiana; Westmoreland (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 3:29PM EDT until July 23 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Indiana County in west central Pennsylvania... Westmoreland County in southwestern Pennsylvania... Southern Armstrong County in west central Pennsylvania... Northeastern Fayette County in southwestern Pennsylvania... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 329 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Apollo, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... Greensburg, Indiana, Latrobe, Vandergrift, Kittanning, Homer City, Apollo, Mount Pleasant, Scottdale, McChesneytown-Loyalhanna, Blairsville, and Youngwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
